sections.title: Getting Started
sections.content:
## Getting Started

This guide will help you set up and run the project.

### Prerequisites

- Node.js 18+
- npm or yarn
- Git

### Installation

```bash
npm install
npm run build
npm start
```

sections.title: Configuration
sections.content:
## Configuration

The project can be configured through environment variables or config files.

### Environment Variables

| Variable | Description | Default |
|----------|-------------|--------|
| `STACKS_NETWORK` | Network to use | mainnet |
| `API_URL` | API endpoint | https://api.hiro.so |

sections.title: API Reference
sections.content:
## API Reference

### Core Functions

#### `initialize(config)`

Initializes the client with the given configuration.

**Parameters:**
- `config` - Configuration object

**Returns:** Client instance

sections.title: Troubleshooting
sections.content:
## Troubleshooting

### Common Issues

#### Connection Errors

If you see connection errors, check:
1. Network connectivity
2. API endpoint configuration
3. Firewall settings
